Subject: Re: Visitors / Spy? Me? / Energon

Motormaster noticed Killfest looking him over, but it was not important at
the moment. "Yaeh, that's about it. We can provide you with some heavy duty
firepower. Mostly in return, I want to know where the Ark is?" He said
abruptly.
